General.Name: We&Win Diversification Co Ltd
General.Description: We & Win Diversification Co., Ltd. engages in the rental and sale of real estate properties in Taiwan. It is also involved in the public construction investment; new towns and community development; wholesale of medical equipment; and international trade businesses. The company was formerly known as Oncoprobe Biotech Inc. and changed its name to We & Win Diversification Co., Ltd. in 2009. We & Win Diversification Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
